channel.title: Kyle Malloy on
channel.description: Recent content in Kyle Malloy on

item.title: About Me
item.description: A year ago I left my 9-5 as a civil engineer in Boston. My wife and I decided it was time for a hard reset. So we took off in a converted church van to travel the US.

item.title: Resume
item.description: Work Experience # <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> CivSoft Current CTO, Co-Founder Remote Founded with my wife, Chandler, we are developing software that provides value by improving workflows and giving civil engineers more time back in their day.

item.title: What I'm Doing Now
item.description: Updated on May 16th, 2023 Civil Engineering # <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> Working part-time, remote. Programming # <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?> Working on our MVP at CivSoft. Outside of Work # üöê Traveling across the eastern US for most of the summer.
